Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Sahetukaduka
2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Sahetukaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
4.
11Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
12Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
13Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
14Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi…pe…  pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
